attributes.action: Vote on opening the country back up instead of locking it down due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government should put the coronavirus restrictions to a public vote to see if the majority of the population want to get on with it instead of pandering to the snowflake society that we seem to be living in. We are a capitalist country and should be able to have the right to go to work and create wealth without restrictions due to coronavirus.
attributes.background: Let the general public vote on whether to open the country back up so we can all get on with our lives instead of locking it down and damaging the economy even further due to coronavirus.
